column4: is it possible to move a ubuntu install to another drive and erase the old drive? or at the very least, partition the drive ubuntu is installed on down from 3TB to 100GB?
when i format an extra drive, i shouldn't select scheme: master boot record, right? that's only if i'm going to use this drive as the boot drive?
yes , you can resize the ubuntu partition to any size you wish as long as / and your home dir fit on it
